name: COLORFUL PALETTE
description:
Colorful Palette is a new type of drawing puzzle game.


In each stage, there is an unfinished painting with a few color palettes attached to it. Your role is to use a paintbrush to complete the painting so that it becomes a perfectly matching image. 

The game's mood is relaxing, but if you love something more challenging, you can finish the early stages quickly and move on to more challenging stages. The later stages are difficult—those new to puzzles may initially have a difficult time with them. First, you need to find a few possible ways to make the colors in the target image by mixing the provided colors. You will notice that the brush is always attached to the floor, so completing each stage without ruining the already-completed parts can sometimes be challenging. 

In a web version, each stage is updated everyday.
